description: MediSecure, an Australian prescription delivery service provider, revealed that roughly 12.9 million people had their personal and health information stolen in an April ransomware attack. [...]
title: MediSecure: Ransomware gang stole data of 12.9 million people

description: Microsoft says an Azure configuration change caused a major Microsoft 365 outage on Thursday, affecting customers across the Central US region. [...]
title: Major Microsoft 365 outage caused by Azure configuration change
